intro: Cynoglossum cheirifolium var. lasianthum, commonly known as the narrow-leaved forget-me-not, is a flowering plant belonging to the Boraginaceae family. It is characterized by its slender, lance-shaped leaves and clusters of blue or violet flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils in mountainous regions. It is native to parts of Europe and the Middle East. This variant is distinguished by its smaller, more compact flowers compared to the typical form of Cynoglossum cheirifolium.
